/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. A white van is parked on the left side of the street, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. On the right side of the street, a red brick wall stands tall, its vibrant color contrasting with the greenery of the trees and shrubs that line the street. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, completing the picturesque view of this worldwide landmark.
